project: AIOps POC - Modular ACI Agent & Orchestration
description: Proof of Concept for modular AIOps pipeline with dynamically generated tools and orchestration.

userStories.title: External Device Configuration
userStories.description: As a DevOps Engineer, I want to define my ACI APIC credentials and URL in a config file so that I don't hardcode secrets or IPs.
acceptanceCriteria: System loads device details from `config/devices.yaml`
Authentication uses credentials from config to generate tokens
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Dynamic Tool Generation
userStories.description: As a Developer, I want to add a new ACI API endpoint by adding a JSON entry, so that the Agent immediately gains this capability without code deployments.
acceptanceCriteria: System reads `config/aci_endpoints.json` on startup
Factory function converts JSON entries into LangChain `StructuredTool` objects
Pydantic models for tool arguments are generated dynamically and correctly
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Intelligent Agent Execution
userStories.description: As a User, I want the ACI Agent to select the correct tool based on natural language queries.
acceptanceCriteria: Agent selects correct tool (e.g. `get_tenant_health`) for query
Agent correctly extracts arguments
Generic runner executes the API call (GET only)
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Triage Synthesis with Error Handling
userStories.description: As a User, I want a final summary of the technical data, including any tools that failed to execute.
acceptanceCriteria: ACI Agent catches tool execution errors and logs them (Partial Failure)
Triage Agent receives success data and error reports
Triage Agent generates a text summary of findings
Triage output mentions skipped/failed tools
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Validate end-to-end functionality
userStories.description: As a User, we should not get any errors when running the full workflow.
acceptanceCriteria: when sending message through the chat, the llm response should be presented
no internal server error when running the full workflow
